text:
In this video, we will
explain what glow berries are,
how to find them, and how to grow them.

Glow berries are a unique
food item that have been added
as part of the Minecraft 1.17 update.

They can be collected from
cave vines and then planted.
Glow berries are edible,
and they can also be used to breed foxes.

To harvest glow berries,
simply right-click on them.

There are two locations where
glow berries can be found.
The first is a lush cave biome.
This is a cave biome found underground.

To find a lush cave biome,
search for an azalea tree
and dig down from the tree to get there.

It's also possible that
you can find a cave opening
to a lush cave biome.
The second location is a mineshaft.
Mineshafts can also be found underground.

Three to six glow berries
have a 38.7% chance

to appear in minecart
chests and mineshafts.
After harvesting a glow berry,

you can plant it by placing
it on the bottom of a block.
This will cause a cave vine to spawn.
Make sure there's at least a two-block gap
underneath for it to grow.
Glow berries don't need any light,

and they can be placed
under any kind of block.

After planting it, you
can wait for it to grow
or use bone meal to speed up the process.
